title: Progress on Paddy Purchasing  Programme in 2011 Yala Season as at 2011?10?06
decision_details:
- Cabinet noted the progress of the programme of purchasing paddy in the Yala Season 2011, presented by Hon. Johnston Fernando, Minister of Co-operatives and Internal Trade, giving the following details totaling to 74,869 MT. as at 2011-10-06: 
	
		*	Polonnaruwa Zone		-	         29,418  MT 
		*	Wayamba Zone		-	         	 5698  MT
		*	Ampara Zone		-	         17,893 MT
		*	Anuradhapura Zone		-		 9476 MT
		*	Southern Zone		-		 5550 MT
		*	Northern Zone		-		   856 MT
		*	Eastern Zone		.	-		  5978 MT
